meanings.definition: Having the characteristic smell or taste of a goat.
meanings.sent1: The cheese was goatier than the others on the plate.
meanings.sent2: The milk had a goatier flavor than expected.
meanings.sent3: She wrinkled her nose at the goatier smell coming from the barn.
meanings.sent4: The goatier taste lingered on his tongue long after he finished eating.
meanings.sent5: The goatier aroma filled the room, making it hard to ignore.

meanings.definition: Resembling a goat in appearance or behavior.
meanings.sent1: The costume made him look even goatier than the actual goats.
meanings.sent2: Her stubbornness was becoming goatier with each passing day.
meanings.sent3: He tried to climb the tree, but ended up looking even goatier than before.
meanings.sent4: The old man's beard was goatier than the young boy's.
meanings.sent5: The goatier movements of the mountain goat amazed the hikers.
